throwable_path.description: [unit]Path to the unit that should be thrown.

audio_node.description: [string]Node to play spinning audio effects from.

panel_count.description: The number of panels this thrower has.

throwable_count.description: The number of throwables to throw per-panel.

throw_delay.description: Time from spawn until it starts throwing. Should match the deploy animation timing.

throw_duration.description: Duration across which to throw the throwables.

arming_time.description: Duration to wait before arming the mines.

spin_rpm.description: Spin rate of the thrower, in revolutions per minute (RPM).

spindown_duration.description: Duration across which to decelerate when done throwing.

throw_spread_range.description: Degrees of spread in the direction of throwing, for each panel.

on_throw_effect.description: Effect to play when this unit throws something. Node gets overridden with 'panel_%d_mine_%d' depending on panel/mine.
